Description: On US-13 North in the City of Virginia Beach, at Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.
Label: Weather Incident - High Wind - Advisory

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 241.1 in the County of Rockingham, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 164 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 663 East in the County of Pulaski, in the vicinity of Beach Dr; Holly Dr; Rt. 757N/S (Pulaski County), motorists can expect delays due to weather.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory
